minimum_cell_execution_time.title: Minimum Notebook Cell Execution Time
minimum_cell_execution_time.description: The minimum execution time to send out notification for a particular notebook cell (in seconds).

report_cell_execution_time.title: Report Notebook Cell Execution Time
report_cell_execution_time.description: Display notebook cell execution time in the notification. If last_cell_only is set to true, the total duration of the selected cells will be displayed.

report_cell_number.title: Report Notebook Cell Number
report_cell_number.description: Display notebook cell number in the notification.

cell_number_type.title: Cell Number Type
cell_number_type.description: Type of cell number to display when the report_cell_number is true. Select from 'cell_index' or â€˜cell_execution_count'.

last_cell_only.title: Trigger only for the last selected notebook cell execution.
last_cell_only.description: Trigger a notification only for the last selected executed notebook cell.

notification_methods.title: Notification Methods
notification_methods.description: Option to send a notification with the specified method(s). The available options are 'browser' and 'ntfy'.
